description:
FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT PROPERTY
Whether you're buying your first home or adding to your investment portfolio this is the right property for you. Approx. 3 years old and close to schools and parks this property has size and location in its favour. Featuring:
- 3 bedrooms, Master with ensuite and walk-in robe
- The modern kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and the 600mm under-bench oven has a natural gas cooktop.
- 2 Living areas - Formal lounge and separate dining area both of which have a split-system reverse-cycle heating and cooling unit.
- There's a double garage and garden shed as well as a large courtyard
If you're just starting out in the property market this is an excellent first home or the perfect home if you're looking to downsize. But investors will also be pleased because the location of this home is close to all shops and schools - just a short walk away. So, call Glenda Ashton today to make a time to inspect this property.

REFURBISHED PERIOD HOME
Fully refurbished three bedroom, two bathroom period home.
Some features of the property are a Large kitchen, Dining, Living area with Wood heater.
With the ever increasing cost of water a rain water tank is ideal. Solar power, Double lock up garage and for the keen gardener a beautiful garden.
Property Code: 590

NEAT TIDY 3 BEDROOM HOME
Neat and tidy 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home with a large kitchen with plenty of storage space.
Recently renovated bathroom with separate toilet.
The house is located within walking distance of all amenities.
Property Code: 612

Finest Single Level Living in the Upper Murray
In arguably Corryongs best streets, with the golf course, air port and township a short stroll away, this exquisite contemporary home enjoys its prime viewing position of Mt Mittamattite
Deceptive spacious on large allotment in this sought after location, the single-level design allows seamless living throughout with a generous floor-plan, offering exceptional four bedroom accommodation. Stunning living areas overlook the mountain and open directly to the sun filled entertaining & BBQ area.
An impressive gourmet kitchen is fully equipped easily catering for large scale entertaining. The fireplace creates the perfect feature as the sun sets, while the high ceilings and uninterrupted views out to the valley and mountain provide the ultimate daytime panorama.
Air-conditioned & hydronic heated throughout with a list of features to numerous too mention: Inspection is highly recommended
Property Code: 637

Large Block With Good Frontage
Situated in elevated location, this block of land is ready for you to build. Approximately 1088m2 this generous sized block of land has all services available. With Schools, Shopping Centre in close proximity you only need to build your new home to make the dream a reality.
Property Code: 629

QUALITY HOME IN QUALITY LOCATION
This ideal home feels spacious yet understated, with views of the mountains and valleys, this really is a home you can enjoy in all seasons. Featuring 4 bedrooms all with walk in robes plus a good sized study, Spacious separate living area plus the alfresco to entertain or relax outdoors, a great entertaining kitchen you will find loads of storage or a second retreat on the ground floor. A double garage with room for two large cars and remote roller doors. The home really is something for every member of the family whether its garderning or entertaining, this home is located in a quality location and will impress on inspection.
Property Code: 611

Neat and Tidy Home
A very fresh and well designed home. This spacious home, offers you quality fixtures and fittings. Featuring three bedrooms, master with walk in robe & ensuite, open plan kitchen, dining and family room, split system air & heating, carpeted through out. Located close to the main street of Corryong and is complimented by a low maintenance garden
Property Code: 526

Character, Space & Timeless Elegance!
"The Croft" was built circa 1937 and has recently been lovingly restored and renovated featuring stunning polished floorboards high ceilings and an abundance of character with all the modern conveniences we desire.
Comprising three spacious bedrooms complete with ceiling fans and heating.
Modern bathroom with a separate laundry and powder room.
Two living areas both complete with the ambiance of a wood fire. The stylish kitchen is equipped with timber bench tops, plenty of storage including a pantry, electric cooking and a dishwasher.
Ducted cooling plus split system air conditioning ensures comfort year round.
Positioned on 1000m2 allotment, outdoors offers a fabulous deck overlooking the large secure yard, the shed is an added extra.
Located within a 300 metre stroll to gorgeous local cafes and shops.
For the past two years this property has successfully functioned as short term furnished accommodation and could easily continue to operate this way. Owners are willing to negotiate the sale of this home as fully furnished. This is the perfect opportunity for the astute investor or owner occupier who wants to enjoy the comfort, charm and lifestyle this home has to offer.

IDEALLY LOCATED CLOSE TO SHOPS
Situated in a good location and quiet neighbourhood is this 60s built house on a good sized yard (889 sqs)
2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, large lounge with gas fireplace, separate dining room.
Parking poses no problems with a long driveway to the carport and space under house for a vehicle
This property has loads of potential for someone looking to secure a sound reasonably priced house and is prepared to do upgrades themselves
Worth an inspection
Property Code: 614

BUY ME
Buy this block and you will be located close to the Corryong's main street, hospital and local amenities.
This block is gently sloping to the rear with good access to Greenham Street.
The block would suite an astute investor looking for the right location all you need now is a builder!
Property Code: 479

Elevated Quality Built Home
Nestled in a quiet street in Corryong you will find this charming elevated home that has been renovated and is boasting with warmth and charm throughout. Set on approximately 1252 sqm there is two street frontages . Being a short walk into town you will be in the heart of Corryong with local schools nearby, cafes, parks.
As you step through the entrance of this beautiful residence you will take in the features of this home with high ceilings, picture rail walls and new carpets. Off the entrance is the lounge area with wood heater with cooker and large windows allowing an abundance of natural light to fill the room.
There are three large bedrooms both with built in robes and a gorgeous ensuite off the master. The home is serviced by a large family bathroom with separate bath and shower and has been tastefully renovated using natural tones.
The kitchen is stylish and has ample storage, dishwasher, pantry cupboards with sapacoiuos bench top. There is a large laundry with abundance of storage and has easy access to outside.
You will be delighted that all the hard work has been done with, wiring, painting and renovations all completed. Featuring: Split-system air conditioning, wood heater, ceiling fans, single garage and double lock up garage/workshop and much more.
Well presented properties such as these are highly sought after, so dont miss out, make your appointment today.
Property Code: 607

As Cute as a Button
This adorable red brick cottage was built in the late 1800's. It has been beautifully renovated yet holds it's historical charm with high ceilings, intricate details and open fireplaces to create a cosy ambiance perfect for the winter weather setting upon us.
Comprising three bedrooms all include heating.
Well appointed formal lounge has the comfort of a reverse cycle split system.
Spacious, tastefully designed kitchen, dining area features bamboo flooring, plenty of storage space, electric cooking, wood heater and split system air conditioning.
On trend bathroom with exposed brick wall, second toilet and laundry separate.
Outdoors offers an undercover entertainment area and garden shed plus undercover car parking with the convenience of access to the secure yard.
Located within 300 metres of the supermarket and a number of gorgeous cafes. Sporting facilities and schools are also nearby.
All the hard work has been completed! For the past four years this property has operated as a successful fully furnished short term accommodation facility, the savvy investor could easily continue this business, especially if you snap this up before the peak ski season kicks off or for the owner occupier, move in and enjoy the charm this home will deliver.

GRAND RESIDENCE
This grand quality home sits high on the hill overlooking Corryong
A large spacious family home built by the current owners with 360 degree sweeping views of the valleys and the surrounding mountains.
The home sits on over 12 acres of land, allowing scope to develop further as a small farm or boutique enterprise.
This property has so much to offer the astute buyer,
Features:
Wide entryway into home
Large open lounge with windows along one wall to capture views of the valley, Wood Heater, Split System Airconditioner
Beautifully appointed kitchen with gas cooktop, electric oven and plenty of cupboard space
Four spacious bedrooms with built in wardrobes, main has ensuite
Hot water is thermostatically controlled for young children an added safety feature in main bathroom
Three metre wide verandah surrounds three sides
There are so many features to this property an inspection is highly recommended
Inspection can be arranged with 24 hours notice.
Property Code: 600

Ideal Block ready for your dream home
Call the builder that's all you will need to do this great sized building block is ready to go
Property Code: 329

Neat as a pin & Ready to go
Nothing to do but move into this central home on 933m2 set on a corner block with a private back yard.
Fully renovated through-out with quality fittings featuring spacoius living area including a light and bright out-door entertainment deck, centrally located kitchen with lots of bench space, gas stove, dishwasher.
Three double bedrooms, master with built in robe, main bathroom just a step down the hall to accommodate the other two bedrooms.
Cottage gardens with Watering system, extra water storage and garden shedding all combine to make this a logical transition for permanent or short term living. Ispection will not disappoint.
Property Code: 579

Great Location Needing Renovation and Love
This home situates itself on the main street of Corryong. The house consists of three bedrooms, one bathroom(with shower over the bath) and a spacious kitchen. The back yard if fully enclosed and a inspection is a must at this price! Loads of upside.
Property Code: 567

BRAND NEW 2 BEDROOM HOME
This could be exactly what you're looking for!!
Within easy access to Corryong Shops and only 200 meters from the Corryong Hospital.
Comprising two bedrooms, the main bedroom has a robe and ensuite.
Surrounding windows provide natural light and good views from the lovely modern kitchen, dining and living area, equipped with a dishwasher, electric cooking, quality floor coverings,
Private rear courtyard has been landscaped.
Full second bathroom, separate toilet, separate laundry.
Ducted heating and cooling ensures comfort year round.
Remote entry spacious single garage with the convenience of internal access.
Secure yard with established low maintenance gardens creates privacy. Side yard access an extra benefit.
Don't delay arrange an inspection of this quality home today.
Property Code: 531

Looking for A Family Home
Spacious Family residence over looking Corryong and local mountains this large family home has so much to offer. This four bedroom home has room to grow and with three separate living areas lots of space for formal living, entertaining or just relaxing with the kids downstairs. Central well appointed kitchen with pantry and breakfast bar over looking large outdoor balcony. The property is located on a large sloping block that has been landscaped and set up with three separate and private outdoor areas. If you are looking for space and a quality location an inspection is reccomended
Property Code: 508

ELEVATED BLOCK WITH ALL THE SERVICES
Take advantage of its proportions and position to design and construct a family home you desire from the outset without compromising on size and quality. Plans are available to inspect from builders.
The block is 1187m2 and located only moments from the shops within walking distance to the schools. Enjoy easy access to the Corryongs main shopping strip, make your family dream a reality or develop further STCA.
With crossover in place and all services available you don't want to miss your chance to secure a fabulous future for your family.
Property Code: 549

Great Starter in Great Location
Well presented both internally and externally is this 3 bedroom weatherboard home, currently leased to a long term tenant. Good sized living area neat and clean. Works undertaken include a new colourbond roof and new wood heater to warm the whole house, carpeted throughout, close to schools, shops and sporting complex.
Ideal for the first homebuyer or investor in a quiet neighbourhood, the property is a large level block ideal for dual occupancy to the astute investor.
Get off the rental roundabout and into your first home or for investors there is not much to do but move in or collect the rent!
Property Code: 529

PACKED WITH PERIOD FEATURES
This lovely four bedroom home has been renovated and remodelled, featuring original hardwood polished floors, high ornate ceilings, remodelled kitchen with electric cooking. New bathroom, wood heating and two reverse cycle air conditioners. Side access to backyard with carport and garden shed. 30 T is an ideal first home buyer or investment property and within walking distance to the main street, and local schools. Currently being used as a successful Air B&B property with repeat bookings. For Private inspection contact selling agent.
Property Code: 576
